casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lawrence JACKSON. No. 424P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Gary R. Govert, Special Deputy Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of February 2005 by Defendant for Reconsideration:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
